pages.text: The most powerful rune I have discovered, this rune can take normal rune stone and enchant it with an incredible permanency. Not even taint is getting through that.
Run cost: 800 Tears$(br)$(l:cages/tier_iii)Tier III Soul Cage$(/l)$(br2)It is also the only way to get rid of the stone once enchanted.
$(br2)I wonder... Can I use this method of enchantment on armor?
